testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: What our users say
testimonials.testimonial1Text: Excellent app! We managed to collect over 300 photos from our guests that we wouldn't have otherwise.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: Our guests were delighted by how easy it was to add photos. We recommend it to everyone!
testimonials.testimonial3Text: The best way to save all wedding memories in one place.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: Yes, the basic version of the application is completely free to use.
faq.question2: How many photos can guests upload?
faq.answer2: Each guest can upload up to 10 photos.
faq.question3: How long are the photos stored?
faq.answer3: Photos are stored for 1 months after the wedding.
faq.question4: Do guests need to create an account?
faq.answer4: No, guests sign in only with their name and email address.
